title: Black Belt
summaries: The Black Belt is a Hardmode, post-Plantera accessory which has a 8.33*1/12 (8.33%) / 15.97*23/144 (15.97%) chance to drop from Bone Lee in the post-Plantera Dungeon. The Black Belt grants a 10% chance to dodge attacks, and hazards such as spikes and lava. A cloud of smoke surrounds the player upon a successful dodge.
